transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaste. 
Customer: Sir good morning kaise hai sir aap?
Executive: Good morning sir.
Customer: Ji sir sir ji aapka aapke staff ne concern raise kiya tha trade ke liye aur isme kuch service ke regarding sir aap mujhe batayenge please kya issue aa rahi hai?
Executive: Kuch issue nahi aa raha hai sir.
Customer: Achcha to sir isko close kar de actually kya hai na aapke staff ne sir raise kiya hua tha uske liye main aapko follow up kar raha hu din se theek hai to isme se close kar de isko abhi chalega?
Executive: Kaunsa sir?
Customer: Sir ek concern aapke staff ne raise kiya hua tha waha se service ke regarding ki unhe kuch bulk lead ke regarding kuch matlab information chahiye tha to agar aap agar aap batao to main aapko kuch guidance kar du yaha se bulk drive kaise nikalni hai ya fir aap apne staff ko bata de kaise karna hai usko.
Customer: Aap kya bol rahe ho mere ko samajh mein aa raha hai sir ji.
Executive: Sir main ye bol raha hu actually kya hai na aapke staff ne raise kiya tha ki unhe bulk jo lead hai wo kahan pe dikhti hai ya wo bulk lead kaise milengi wo unhe shayad nahi pata hai theek hai to unhone isi ke regarding jo hai ek concern raise kiya tha theek hai to uska ek ticket open hua hai to main usi ke regarding puch raha hu ki aapko sir usme pata hai ki aap bulk lead kahan se dekhte hain by lead mein ya fir main aapko guide kar du aap dekh kar lo ek baar apne staff ko bata dijiyega iske bare mein.
Customer: Ji sir kar lijiyega na wo pata nahi mere ko.
Executive: Theek hai sir sir agar aap application pe hai abhi kya?
Customer: Nahi sir.
Executive: System pe hai sir ya fir agar aapne application open open kiya apne phone mein?
Customer: Ji sir main open kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan sir aap phone speaker pe rakhte hai na apna wo application open kariye.
Customer: Ji sir open kiya humne.
Executive: Theek hai hum usko sir uska open karke usme kya hoga by lead ka ek section hoga.
Customer: By leads.
Executive: Latest ya sir nahi agar aap latest pe click kariyega theek hai aapko pehle dekhiye side mein kahin filter likha bana hoga usme na aapko dikhega by lead ka jo bulk wala section hota hai wo aapko show karega waha pe.
Customer: Nahi sir aisa kuch nahi hai. Sir ek minute sir main thoda sa aapko na ek baar catalog yaha se open kar le raha hu bas ek minute dijiyega mujhe.
Executive: Sir lead wagera consume kar rahe hain aapke staff dekh rahe hain isko?
Customer: Kya sir?
Executive: Aap lead jo by lead wagera hai sir aap dekh rahe ho ya fir aapke staff dekh rahe hain abhi?
Customer: Mera bhai ne dekh raha hai sir ji.
Executive: Achcha actually kya tha na ki sir wo friday ko unhone ticket raise kari thi uske baad baat karne ke liye try kari par unhe matlab actually kya tha thoda language ka issue tha isliye samajh nahi paya theek hai sir aapko dekhiye waha pe lead type ka ek section aa raha hoga filter mein lead type likh ke aa raha hoga kuch.
Customer: Ji sir rukiye.
Executive: Lead type mein aap click karenge na jaise aapko waha pe bulk business aur GST ka option dikhega.
Executive: Sir waha pe aapko dher sare aap agar sir aapko relevant ka ek option hai kya dekhiye relevant.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: By lead pe click karne pe aapko ek filter mein relevant ka option milega relevant mein aap jaoge to aapko fir waha pe lead type ka option dikhega.
Customer: Rukiye rukiye sir wo to koi nahi main call pe ek baar dekh lijiye.
Executive: Dikh nahi raha hai.
Customer: Sir aapne matlab system pe use karte ho ya fir application pe use karte ho?
Executive: Mobile pe use karte hai sir.
Executive: Phone pe hi use karte hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir aap mujhe na ek minute dijiyega actually kya hai na main aapko ek link share kar raha hu agar aapke paas do minute ho to aap phone mein join kar lijiye theek hai actually kya hai na ki abhi aapke paas aap yaha pe deal karte ho na sir aapka bhi Karnataka ka Belagavi mein.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Belagavi mein aapke paas bulk mein lagbhag do se ek se do lakh ke aas pass ke leads aayi hongi.
Executive: Theek hai to main aapko wo dikha de raha hu aur jo bulk by leads wagera kahan se nikalte hain nikalte hain wo bhi aap isme se dekh sakte ho theek hai isme aapko isme aapko GST wali aur bulk by lead jo hai wo dikh jati hai.
Executive: Theek hai to sir ek minute rukiyega main aapko na ek ek link share kar raha hu aap phone se chaho to isse join kar sakte hain.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Aap sir ek minute call dijiyega 30 second.
Executive: Sir sir ek baar apna mail check kariye maine aapko na ek link share kiya hai please aap join kariye mushkil se sir paanch minute lagna hai main aapko guide kar dunga phone se join kar sakte ho.
Customer: Ji sir main mail batata hu usi pe bhej dena.
Executive: Ji sir main mail batata hu.
Executive: Okay wo mail mere bhai ko jayega.
Executive: Achcha wo wala jo sir sir join join aap hi karenge na aapke matlab bhai karenge.
Customer: Main hi karunga sir wo usko hindi nahi aati hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha achcha theek hai sir main aapko main ek baar whatsapp kar du aap whatsapp pe dekh lo easy rahega.
Customer: Ji ji okay.
Executive: Theek hai main share karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs guidance on finding bulk buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive tried guiding on finding bulk buyleads.

- Executive offered to share a link to join.

- Executive agreed to share the link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share the link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, application, guidance, whatsapp
